scripts.postinstall: npm run typings-search && npm run typings && npm run tsc-compile
scripts.typings-search: typings search node && typings search express && typings search body-parser && typings search serve-static && typings search express-serve-static-core && typings search mime && typings search passport && typings search jsonwebtoken
scripts.typings: typings install --save --global env~node && typings install --save --global dt~express && typings install --save --global dt~body-parser && typings install --save --global dt~serve-static && typings install --save --global dt~express-serve-static-core && typings install --save --global dt~mime
